name: Save Santa!
description:
A goofy cartoon elf game where you play as 3 different elves with individual abilities. 

In a quest to save Santa! 

Santa was texting and driving and hit a mountainside.

 His sleigh pieces scattered all over the North Pole. 

He is counting on 3 mighty Elves to help him retrieve these pieces before Christmas is ruined!!

These unique elves are the only ones that can pull off the job, 

But they're trapped behind a  gate. . . 

In order to find Santa you need to escape first, 

Each elf must unlock their door and they can't do it alone!

Communicate between each other and look for hidden password and puzzles. 

Find Santa, Repair the Sleigh, and Save Christmas!
